overview: In this sequel to Sexcapades (1983), porn director Harry Crocker must deal with his producer Louis, Louis' wife, 18-year old up-and-comer, Frances, and her ambitious mother, Mrs. Exeter. He also falls for his controlling star, Marilyn.
tagline: Even hotter than last year's smash hit "Sexcapades"
title: Great Sexpectations
